title: The Evolution of Us
overview:
This
 epic science special explores how genetics have underpinned the whole 
of human evolution, from our rise from a class of primates on the 
African plain to our spread across Earth. It asks how genetics could 
play an even greater role in determining where evolution will take us 
next. Location filming combined with state-of-the-art computer 
visualizations tell the amazing story of the human race.
